The Game Heroes

This book is about challenges. It’s about kids teleporting through a computer. You’ve got to watch… you’ve got to beware of Dr Jeff and his evil plan. Can these kids stop Evil Jeff? Can they use their new powers to get through the different levels? Read on to find out what happens next!
